error.admin: Please do not run AMRPC with administrator privileges!

notification.coverlistUpdated: The cover list has been successfully updated.
notification.modallistUpdated: The modal list has been successfully updated.
notification.alphaNotAllowed: You are not allowed to use the alpha version!

usercount.title: User-Counting
usercount.description: May we update our user counter by your installation of the app for our statistics? We do not send respectively store any personal information about you.

911.title: In memory of the victims of September 11
911.description:
To honor those who died on September 11 we added some custom album covers for these songs: %s
And when you want, you can change all of the covers (only for today).

appleEvent.title: Do not forget!
appleEvent.description: Today at %d o'clock (10a.m. PDT) is the Apple Event! Watch it live here: %s

newUpdate.title: Software Update
newUpdate.description: Version %version% is available for your PC.

installed.description: Version %version% is available for your PC and is ready to install.

alphaVersion.title: Alpha version
alphaVersion.description: Hello user! We are happy to announce that we have just released our alpha version of AMRPC. For now, we only have a few spots for the alpha version. So be quick if you want to test!
